ygData.subject: RE: Re: Eldritch Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah you will lose faction with the DE Guards but you can fix that by killing the Halflings in Nek forest... but that messes up faction with Rivervale...
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah you will lose faction with the DE Guards but you can fix that by
killing the Halflings in Nek forest... but that messes up faction with
Rivervale... anyone see a vicious circle happening here ? ;p

Darkadvent - Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Alex Shimanovsky [mailto:10815@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 3:52 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Re: Eldritch Faction



>You can quest for the gemchoppers, the 27c blackbox quest gives eldritch
>faction when you give the keycards to the clockworks, ya need good faction
>with King Ak'anon though (the clockwork faction)
>
>Or you can kill members of The Dead (DE necros) such as Kizdean Gix in the
>west commons.


Uhm, if I kill DE necros do I loose faction with Dark Elf Guards ? and the
city of Neriak
?

and is the 27c blackbox quest hard ? can I say do like 30 of them in 1 hour?

Cuz I dont want to waste 30 hours fixing my faction and I also dont want to
kill my DE faction.
